attributes.additional_details:
Terrorists are getting lacks prison sentences, These people are intent in demonstrating and killing many UK people, like 7/7 and in America 9/11 and the Boston bombers.

Why are we using our jails to keep these people in?  Should we be looking down the path of a POW camp, under military rule, not some namby pamby prison,having access to Communications(tv and newspapers) but a strict controlled punishment centre  for them.

Remember, these say they are at war with us, so treat them as POW, no time sentences, just locked away for the good of the rest of the UK citizens
